name: Jam Master Jay
description: '''Jason William Mizell''' (January 21, 1965 â€“ October 30, 2002), better known by his stage name '''Jam Master Jay''', was an American musician, record producer and DJ. He was the DJ of the influential [[hip hop]] group [[Run-DMC]]. During the 1980s, Run-DMC became one of the biggest hip hop groups, credited with breaking hip hop into mainstream music.  Mizell was murdered in his [[Queens, New York]] recording studio in 2002.
